metadata.name: 2/5 â€¢ The Longest Whistlegraph Ever (so far) w/ Media Archive
metadata.description:
*[The Longest Whistlegraph Ever (so far)](https://sites.rhizome.org/the-longest-whistlegraph-ever-so-far/about)* is a whistlegraph commissioned by Rhizome in 2021 that debuted at the New Museum on May 14, 2022.

 In addition to the film, this token unlocks materials from our composition process, including manuscripts, recordings, and a full graphic score. Collectors, we encourage you to download and securely store the contents of the included [film and media archive](https://long.whistlegraph.com/unlock), accessible only to token holders.

 Stream an IPFS hosted copy of the [film in 4K](https://whistlegraph.mypinata.cloud/ipfs/QmPKgGWSoLrEUmuKh3HG7KgCevXiiVmkN8YF8gJVtobZj9?stream=1).

 Whistlegraphs are audio-visual digital artworks performed manually by drawing and singing. Every whistlegraph results in a poetic image through the performance of a graphic score.
